text:
A man was killed and five others sustained injuries when a SETC bus bound for Thiruvananthapuram and a lorry transporting poultry waste collided head on at Karavilai on the Nagercoil-Thiruvananthapuram National Highway near Thuckalay on Friday.

According to police, bus driver Raja Singh (55), who was caught in the mangled front portion of the bus, died on the way to hospital and the five injured were rushed to Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital.
title: Driver killed in bus-lorry collision
